trans:
The promised story about the "Pornsensual" party in Kyiv üòè
This party is organized in various European countries, and it has taken place in Kyiv several times (of course, before the full-scale war began; not now).
So, this was my first such party (meaning one with a focus on sex, not just a techno rave), so I was actively preparing for it ‚ò∫Ô∏è
I ordered black semi-transparent lingerie with garters (elastic bands), created a very bright look with bright raspberry artificial hair and makeup, and packed everything necessary in a small bag (condoms, lubricant, and napkins).
At that time, I was already in an open relationship with my boyfriend, so we went together (he also brought a paddle and a cane to spank anyone willing üòà, and a vibrating bullet, which I got to know then, but more on that later).
The club where the party took place always had a fairly strict face control, and this time there was also a thorough dress code. But it was winter, so people were initially let inside, and then they would undress and had to pass the dress code.
